## 312. HAND
### Definition
Specifically ‘hand’, i. e. the body part at the end of the arm below the wrist. Not to be confused with specialized terms like ‘palm’, ‘back side of the hand’, ‘right hand’, ‘left hand’ etc. (GLD)The opposition «hand : arm» should be treated the same as «foot : leg», see no. 324.

### Contexts
1. People have fingers on their hands. 2. Give me your hand.
